title: BlueNoroff Deepfake Zoom Scam Hits Crypto Employee with MacOS Backdoor Malware
description: The North Korea-aligned threat actor known as BlueNoroff has been observed targeting an employee in the Web3 sector with deceptive Zoom calls featuring deepfaked company executives to trick them into installing malware on their Apple macOS devices.
